package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: Sudosh2 logging shell
package-manager.description: sudosh(1) is a filter and can be used as a login shell. sudosh(1) takes advantage of PTY devices in order to sit between the user's keyboard and a program, in this case a shell. sudosh(1) was designed specifically to be used in conjunction with sudo(1) or by itself as a login shell. sudosh(1) allows the execution of a root shell with logging. Every command the user types within the root shell is logged as well as the output. The sessions later can be replayed for reviewing purposes.
